definitions: in a manner that is not in accordance with the principles of equality and justice

examples.text: in my view, he was treated unfairly
employees have a right not to be unfairly dismissed

shortDefinitions: in manner that is not in accordance with principles of equality and justice

definitions: in a way that does not follow the rules of a game or sport

examples.text: you can't be accused of cheating or playing unfairly

shortDefinitions: in way that does not follow rules of game or sport
